title: Designing Online Discussion Assessments Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online discussions, basic use of generative AI, and foundational language analysis skills
context.additional_context: Research on online discussion evaluation methods using generative AI for large-scale learners in PBL environments at vocational training institutions

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the achievement of learning objectives in online discussions with over 80% accuracy using generative AI
Learners can distinguish and explain at least three differences between AI coding results and subjective human evaluations.
Learners can design a hybrid assessment model (human+AI) to provide comprehensive feedback on discussion outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
